world.physics: Enchanted forest physics with gentle floating and magical sparkles. Magical projectiles travel gracefully through the air.
world.visualStyle: Mystical enchanted forest with glowing fairy lights, ancient trees, and magical atmosphere with soft lighting.
world.worldDescripiton: A magical enchanted forest filled with ancient towering trees, glowing fairy lights, mystical creatures, and an atmosphere of wonder and magic.

player.render: A young magical girl with flowing robes, holding a glowing magic wand that sparkles with golden light.

emissions.render: Golden magical sparkles that float gracefully from the wand, creating shimmering trails of light and magical effects.

objects.name: ForestFairy
objects.behavior: Floats gently through the forest, moving in graceful patterns while exploring and interacting with the magical environment.
objects.interactionDescription: Engages in friendly conversation, sharing forest wisdom and magical knowledge when approached with kindness.

objects.name: WiseFairy
objects.behavior: Moves slowly and majestically through the forest, occasionally pausing to tend to magical plants and observe the forest.
objects.interactionDescription: Offers ancient wisdom and magical guidance, teaching about the mysteries of the enchanted forest.
